Retail Instalment Sales Of Motor Vehicles

law.catch_line: Holder Of Retail Installment Contract Subject To Buyerâ€™S Defenses Against Seller
law.text: The holder of a retail installment contract or other person acting in his behalf, shall be subject to all defenses, real and personal, which the retail buyer may have against the retail seller thereof.
